introduction: Register a brand as a trademark online. You can’t make changes to your trademark after it’s been registered.
more_information:
The application fee is £170. This is non-refundable and doesn't guarantee registration of your trademark. You also need:

- details for your trademark, eg an illustration or slogan 
- the [trademark classes](http://www.ipo.gov.uk/t-class-guide.htm/ "trademark classes"){:rel="external"} you want to register for, eg medical, vehicles 

The fee for the first trademark class is included in the application fee. Each additional class costs £50.
overview: Register a brand as a trademark to protect your intellectual property
title: Register a trademark
